name: Acrylic Memories
description:
Project made for Global Game Jam 2021, with a theme of 'Lost and Found.'

Navigating an atmospheric city while battling the influences of a drunken stupor, you’ll guide a forlorn artist on a search for remnants of their own paintings. With each piece of artwork found, the artist comes one step closer to unlocking their forgotten inspiration, the glimpse of a newfound hope growing steadily brighter in front of them.

This is a single-player exploration game featuring beautiful hand-drawn graphics and original music/sound. 

Given that there are nearly a million species of insects accounting for over 80% of the world's living creatures, a few bugs are bound to have found their way into our game. If you report them in the comments, our dedicated team of exterminators (read: coders) will get on the job. Unless it's Bugmageddon. In that case, you best run for your lives.
